channel.title: indie-pop on The B0ardside
channel.description: Recent content in indie-pop on The B0ardside

item.title: The B0ardside Top 13 records 2013
item.description: Was hard to cut two out from this selection, so here’s my top 12 for the past year, as usual a bit of a mix between the rock n roll and the electronic noise.. The Pastels – Slow Summit The Spook School – Dress Up Radiator Hospital – Something Wild Zomby – With Love Wyatt Blair – Banana Cream Dream Four Tet – Beautiful Rewind Basic House – Oats Patricia – Body Issues
